attributes.action: call on the minister for communities & local government to withdraw the proposed South West Regional Spatial Strategy & make a renewed & irrevocable commitment to the retention of the Greenbelt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "call on the minister for communities & local government to withdraw the proposed South West Regional Spatial Strategy & make a renewed & irrevocable commitment to the retention of the Greenbelt."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20731


Prime Minister's Office
